meanings.definition: A type of golf club with a wooden head and brass sole.
meanings.sent1: Dad's old brassies are perfect for playing golf on weekends.
meanings.sent2: The golfer carefully selected a set of brassies for the tournament.
meanings.sent3: The brassies in the garage always make me feel like a professional golfer.
meanings.sent4: Her swing was as smooth as a well-polished brassies on the green.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the brassies hitting the ball echoed across the course.

meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate brassies on the antique chest.
meanings.sent2: The brassies on the door gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to play with the shiny brassies on the curtains.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the polished brassies on her dress.
meanings.sent5: The brassies added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.sent1: The band member played the brassies with great skill.
meanings.sent2: The sound of the brassies filled the concert hall.
meanings.sent3: The brassies in the orchestra always stole the show.
meanings.sent4: Her melody was as sweet as the notes from the brassies.
meanings.sent5: The shiny brassies reflected the stage lights beautifully.
